IMMEDIATE START – Short-Form Video Editor (Talking-Head Content)

We’re looking for a fast, detail-oriented editor to help with rough cuts and polished edits for short-form talking-head content (Reels, TikToks, Shorts).

Your role:
Cut raw footage and remove filler (um’s, ah’s, stutters, repeated phrases)
Add simple text, sound effects, overlays, and light transitions as needed
Color grading
Follow pacing, flow, and brand-specific guidelines to keep content engaging
Deliver high-quality edits with fast turnaround (1–2 days max)
Note: Additional resources will be provided (eg. some premiere projects will already have the core cut assembled. music provided, text templates etc.)

Requirements:
Proficient in Premiere Pro (After Effects is a plus)
Strong sense of pacing, rhythm, and visual storytelling
Design-centric approach to fonts, layout, and brand consistency
Clear communicator – fluent in English for English-related video context jokes, proactive with updates and feedback on Whatsapp
Must love the craft of editing and care about the final product

Bonus if:
You use a MacBook
You have a background in graphic design or branding

Please message with your related portfolio of work and a quick summary of your editing experience.

About Duke Phan Studio
We’re a video editing agency working with creators and brands. We specialise in powerful, storytelling-driven content with a sharp eye for keeping everything tailored and on-brand for our clients.
